## whenq variable

Similar to [condq](./pointfree.condq.md)<!-- -->, but only expects `test` result and truthy branch d-stack. Executes word/quotation if `test` is truthy, else does nothing.

( test whenq -- ? )

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
whenq: (ctx: StackContext) => StackContext
```
